task.title: Getting started
task.shortdesc: You can send photos to an individual contact or a group from the chat view.

context.p: Supports Smart phones and tablets running Android OS 2.3 and greater.
To use IBM Connections Chat, you must first install the Connections application on your device from the Google Play store.

The Server Community Manager allows you to create and maintain more than one set of server connection information and login ID and password information for a variety of Connections communities. Typically, the initial connection information is set up by your administrator.
The Connections Chat 'About' Screen provides you with important information regarding your installed version of Connections Chat.
After installing Connections Chat, you can start the application.
